message.name: ERR_NO_NOMINEE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern, for nominee '%1s' has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: INF_OVERPAYMENT_CREATED_SUBJECT
message.locale: An overpayment has been created in respect of case %1s.

message.name: INF_OVERPAYMENT_CREATED_REASON
message.locale: An overpayment has been created in respect of case %1s for %2s. Please review this overpayment to determine if anything requires your attention.

message.name: INF_BENEFIT_UNDERPAYMENT_CREATED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Underpayment case %1s has been created in respect of case %2s.

message.name: INF_BENEFIT_UNDERPAYMENT_CREATED_REASON
message.locale: The underpayment case %1s has been created in respect of case %2s - %3s. The amount of the underpayment was %4s.

message.name: INF_LIABILITY_OVERBILL_CREATED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Over billing case %1s has been created in respect of case %2s.

message.name: INF_LIABILITY_OVERBILL_CREATED_REASON
message.locale: The over billing case %1s has been created in respect of case %2s - %3s. The amount of the overbill was %4s.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_CORRECTION_CREATED_SUBJECT
message.locale: A payment correction has been created in respect of case %1s.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_CORRECTION_CREATED_REASON
message.locale: A payment correction has been created in respect of case %1s for %2s. Please review this reassessment to determine if anything requires your attention.

message.name: INF_CASENOMINEE_DECEASED_SUBJECT
message.locale: The nominee %1s cannot be added to case %2s as they are deceased.

message.name: INF_CASENOMINEE_DECEASED_REASON
message.locale: The nominee %1s cannot be added to case %2s as they are deceased with a date of death of %3d and therefore cannot receive components.
